data.title: HAPPY COMICS ( Standard ) # 28 November 1948
data.meta_description: PHOTO: Sex not the key to giraffe's long neck www.cosmosmagazine.com/news/2814/sex-not-key-giraffes-lon... **** HAPPY COMICS ( Standard ) # 28 November 1948 Contents: 1. "The Boastful Mouse" 2. "Abbott the Rabbit" 3. "The Elephant Who Wouldn't Help" www.comics.org/issue/240274/ **** HAPPY COMICS ( Standard ) # 1 August 1943 - # 40 December 1950 Numbering continues in Happy Rabbit (Standard, 1951 series) www.comics.org/series/13403/ **** COVER GALLERY >> HAPPY COMICS www.comics.org/series/13403/ AND www.mycomicshop.com/search?TID=191401 AND comicbookrealm.com/series/27561/0/happy-comics **** Standard Comics @ Wikipedia " Standard Comics was a comic book imprint of American publisher Ned Pines, who also published pulp magazines under a variety of company names that he also used for the comics. Standard[1] in turn was the parent company of two comic-book lines: Better Publications and Nedor Publishing. Collectors and historians sometimes refer to them collectively as "Standard/Better/Nedor"..." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Standard_Comics AND en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Standard_Comics_publications **** The NEDOR NETWORK www.nedor.net/excitingcomics.htm **** Golden Age Comics Vol.1 - Nedor 1940-1956 2 DVD-ROMs "...There are 250+ titles in this fine collection: This is a 2 DVD compilation of digitized Nedor/Better/Standard Publications comic books. The file formats are .cbr and .cbz which are viewable with an included software program (scanned, tested and guaranteed to be virus free). these files are arcihve files (.rar and .zip) of jpg and gif files that can be read with the reader. they can be printed and individual pages can be extracted if so desired. Some issues are missing covers or pages, most are complete. Missing pages or covers (fc, ifc, bc, ibc) are noted in the listing. After all, they are anywhere from 55 to 80 years old printed on newsprint, a medium not known for longevity! This is a chance to get your hands on some real collectors items at a reasonable price. There are hours and hours of entertainment on these disks! merchant.auctivacommerce.com/s3995/Golden-Age-Comics-Vol1...
data.text:
PHOTO: Sex not the key to giraffe's long neck

www.cosmosmagazine.com/news/2814/sex-not-key-giraffes-lon...

****

HAPPY COMICS ( Standard ) # 28 November 1948

Contents:

1. "The Boastful Mouse"

2. "Abbott the Rabbit"

3. "The Elephant Who Wouldn't Help"

www.comics.org/issue/240274/

****

HAPPY COMICS ( Standard )

# 1 August 1943 - # 40 December 1950

Numbering continues in Happy Rabbit (Standard, 1951 series)

www.comics.org/series/13403/

****

COVER GALLERY >> HAPPY COMICS

www.comics.org/series/13403/

AND

www.mycomicshop.com/search?TID=191401

AND

comicbookrealm.com/series/27561/0/happy-comics

****

Standard Comics @ Wikipedia

" Standard Comics was a comic book imprint of American publisher Ned Pines, who also published pulp magazines under a variety of company names that he also used for the comics. Standard[1] in turn was the parent company of two comic-book lines: Better Publications and Nedor Publishing. Collectors and historians sometimes refer to them collectively as "Standard/Better/Nedor"..."

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Standard_Comics

AND

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Standard_Comics_publications

****

The NEDOR NETWORK

www.nedor.net/excitingcomics.htm

****

Golden Age Comics Vol.1 - Nedor 1940-1956 2 DVD-ROMs

"...There are 250+ titles in this fine collection:

This is a 2 DVD compilation of digitized Nedor/Better/Standard Publications comic books. The file formats are .cbr and .cbz which are viewable with an included software program (scanned, tested and guaranteed to be virus free). these files are arcihve files (.rar and .zip) of jpg and gif files that can be read with the reader. they can be printed and individual pages can be extracted if so desired. Some issues are missing covers or pages, most are complete. Missing pages or covers (fc, ifc, bc, ibc) are noted in the listing. After all, they are anywhere from 55 to 80 years old printed on newsprint, a medium not known for longevity! This is a chance to get your hands on some real collectors items at a reasonable price. There are hours and hours of entertainment on these disks!

merchant.auctivacommerce.com/s3995/Golden-Age-Comics-Vol1...
